clauses.question: 1. What process should the Government use to set a new emissions reduction target in legislation?
clauses.notes:
Man made climate change & the Science is UNPROVEN. No action needs to be or should be taken. No emission targets regulated will
 make any difference to the worlds climate which will change naturally through many other factors outside of mans control, so this is a

 waste of time, money, expense & any BS tax collected as a consequence should be put to better use, ie Healthcare. This
 survey/submission is also BS as there is no option for the realists to state that this contrivance about man being responsible for the
 changing weather is all a gross political manipulation.

clauses.question: 6. Should the Government be able to alter the last emissions budget (i.e. furthest into the future)?
clauses.answer: Yes - each incoming Government should have the option to review the third budget in the sequence
clauses.notes:
Man made climate change & the Science is UNPROVEN. No action needs to be or should be taken. No emission targets regulated will

clauses.question: 10. What are the most important issues for the Government to consider in setting plans to meet budgets? For example, who do we need to work with, what else needs to be considered?
clauses.notes:
Perhaps look at the realistic truth and not the manipulated, brainwashed self interested scientists that incidentally do not form 97%
consensus agreement. More manipulated media hyped BS

clauses.question: 12. What role do you think the Climate Change Commission should have in relation to the New Zealand Emissions Trading Scheme (NZ ETS)?
13. The Government has proposed that Climate Change Commissioners need to have a range of essential and desirable expertise. Do you agree with the proposed expertise? See p45 Our Climate Your Say
clauses.notes: How you can be an expert on something that is untruthful?

clauses.question: 16. Should we explore setting up a targeted adaptation reporting power that could see some organisations share information on their exposure to climate change risks?
clauses.notes:
What? And waste even more precious financial resources on an issue that won’t be stopped by the worlds population. No more gravy
trains needed. This country is already stuffed with this climate change BS rehetoric, and we don’t need any more regulatory BS
controlling groups/committees or otherwise to bleed the average consumer or resident dry of their wealth (what little they have left

after this Government is finished with them)

clauses.question: Do you have any other comments you'd like to make?
clauses.notes:
I do NOT give consent for my name nor this submission or any parts of this submission to be published in any article, newspaper, or
other printed publication or made public on any website.
